wikipedia_page.main: Walter Michael "Mike" Dickson (23 November 1884 – 26 September 1915) was a rugby union player, who represented Scotland, Blackheath and Oxford. He was killed in World War I.

response: *Scots rugby international Second Lieutenant Walter Michael Dickson CWGC Casualty Record, Walter Michael Dickson.
